subject: Re: Test Locator
msgSnippet: Jeff, this is pretty cool, could I talk you into uploading it to the files/src section (http://groups.yahoo.com/group/junit/files/src/)? Thanks! Erik Meade
messageBody:
Jeff, this is pretty cool, could I talk you into uploading it to the
files/src section (http://groups.yahoo.com/group/junit/files/src/)?

Thanks!

Erik Meade
http://junit.org
emeade@...


--- In junit@y..., "Jeff Nielsen" <jeff.nielsen@d...> wrote:
> Below is the class that we use that does what you ask. It defines
a static suite() method that collects all of the valid tests found
under the directory specified in the "test.root.dir" property.
>
